channel.title: MM changing to assassin when jailed shows kill options
channel.description:
I used the MasterMind day ability and was jailed that night by prince. While in jail I could select targets for kill or double kill. As the next day started I was executed by prince but didn't attack either of my two double kill targets.
Shouldn't see night time skills in jail.
Be MM Change to assassin the day before jailed.
Minor bug as it doesn't actually let you kill anyone but still shouldn't show.

item.title: MM changing to assassin when jailed shows kill options
item.dc:creator: Void
item.description:
Unfortunately no. I didn’t think about that while I was in game. I only posted it here even because someone in the after game chat said to.
But it was literally just the jail screen with the two night skill squares where they would be normally on assassin and you can click them and select targets.
Since it was only me, the prince and the original king, so I was screwed anyway, I was talking to the prince about it.

Read full topic
item.source: MM changing to assassin when jailed shows kill options
